project.title: Remote CTG Examination
project.short_desc: Medical system designed to make CTG examination more effective and accessible.
project.long_desc: Remote CTG Examination is a project which aims for decreasing mortality rate of newborns. To speak briefly it is modern, specialized medical system which can be deployed on regular PCs. Low costs and easiness of use makes it an ideal solution both for individual customers and institutions involved in organizing field hospitals, refugee camps etc.
project.tech: C#, .NET, SQL Server, WPF, Silverlight, Assembler, Hardrware
